Extjs

 

Europe meets South Africa

On December 15, 2015 RIDING BYTES and Bika Labs (South Africa) are official Partners.

Bika Labs provides up-market Open Source Laboratory Information Management Systems based on the enterprise CMS Plone.

RIDING BYTES supports Bika Labs with interfacing LIMS to other systems and mobile application development.

Talking about possibilities to interface Bika LIMS with external systems using Plone JSON API at #B3Africa pic.twitter.com/UPIumZWrZz

— RIDING BYTES (@ridingbytes) December 14, 2015

About Plone Commander

Plone Commander is a cross platform application built with ExtJS and Electron. It allows you to find, view, edit and explore Plone contents with ease.

It is free, open source and MIT licensed.

What is it about?

Plone Commander is basically a proof of concept, if the Plone API is capable of handling an external application like this.

Where to get?

Plone Commander is available on the official RIDING BYTES GitHub Account.

See it in action

Riding Bytes

RIDING BYTES is a web development company, which is specialized in UI/UX design, server based solutions and consulting services.

With over 10 years of experience in web development and consulting, we provide the right solutions for small, medium and large enterprises.
